name: Tricky Madness
description:
Arcade snowboarding game - focus on speed and big air - inspired by classics like SSX and 1080.

Wanted to add riding switch, sounds and grab tricks but ran out of time. Oh well, guess I have a jump start on the next demo's todo list. Links to socials below, follow me so you can follow the development - thanks.

My fastest time was 50:20 incase you want to try and beat me.

Controls:
  • steer and crouch - [W][A][D] or Left Thumb stick
  • tricks - hold [Shift] or Right Trigger plus a direction while in air.

Twitter - Youtube - TikTok

Character made from concept art by Tyson Tan (钛山).
